values.Settings.SendGEXInfo.Title: GEX evaluations
values.Settings.SendGEXInfo.Desc: When clicking in the GEX on placements or rankings the data transmitted
values.Settings.SendGildMemberLGInfo.Title: Lb data of other guild members

values.Settings.ShowNeighborsGoods.Title: Neighborhood harvest
values.Settings.ShowNeighborsGoods.Desc: During the visit show what is currently produced

values.Settings.SendInvestigations.Desc: Entering the 'Town Hall'> 'News'> 'Legendary Buildings' will transmit the Fp investments
values.Settings.ShowTavernBadge.Title: Show tavernas badge
values.Settings.ShowTavernBadge.Desc: As soon as the extra move in the tavern is activated, a globally movable counter appears.
values.Settings.PreScanLGList.Title: Preliminary scan of the LG overview
values.Settings.PreScanLGList.Desc:
Scans the overview list of the neighbor when opening and determines possibly fillable LGs.
Note: Since the final seats are only transmitted when opening a LG, the result may differ. The scan is saved, however.
values.Settings.AutomaticNegotiation.Title: Negotiation helper
values.Settings.AutomaticNegotiation.Desc: Should the assistant open automatically with a negotiation and close when canceled?
values.Settings.ResetBoxPositions.Title: Box coordinates
values.Settings.ResetBoxPositions.Desc: Should all box coordinates be reset?
values.Settings.MenuLength.Title: Menu length
values.Settings.MenuLength.Desc:
How many elements high should the menu be?
Empty or "0" means automatic height.
values.Settings.ChangeLanguage.Title: Change language
values.Settings.ChangeLanguage.Desc: Which language, instead of the recognized one, should be used?
